predicate.note: Frames file for 'hum' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entries 40.8.2, 43.2, 26.7; Framenet entry Perception noise.

roleset.name: make a continuous low sound, sing without words

example.name: why do hummingbirds hum?
example.text: John hummed a tune under his breath, knowing it would drive Mary nuts.

example.name: transitive
example.text: The rest are split roughly between optimists who expect Hong Kong to hum along as [*-4] [*?*] before and pessimists who foresee irreparable chaos.
